doc.title: atHome
doc.plot: "atHome", a half hour series, hosted by Johnathan Brownlee and Executive Produced by Winterhaven Productions, Inc., takes a look at home renovation and restoration, particularly of older, heritage and historic homes, from a new perspective. With panache and a dose of humor, Johnathan shows viewers new and practical ideas in renovation while remaining within a budget. atHome's broad appeal to families and their children, couples and individuals makes it a natural in home renovation, enabling them to envision an environment conducive to their lifestyle and dreams.
